      decrements a timer for the boss' shield mechanic, returns true when it is time for the boss to shield.

        public boolean isMainBoss()
        returns true when this is the main boss, false when it is a mini boss

      • addPreAttack

        public void addPreAttack()
        tells the boss to enter their preattack phase

      • timeToAttack

        public boolean timeToAttack()
        keeps track of how many times the boss has attacked in this attack phase and turns preattack off when it hits 4. Keeps track of when the boss needs to attack by incrementing its own timer every time it is called. Returns true when it is time for the boss to attack, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        true when it is time for the boss to attack, false otherwise.

      • timeToShield

        public boolean timeToShield()
        decrements a timer for the boss' shield mechanic, returns true when it is time for the boss to shield.
        Returns:
        true when it is time for the boss to shield, false otherwise

      • getBossTimer

        public int getBossTimer()
        keeps track of an implements a separate gameclock unique to the boss. Can be used to set behavioral options based on the tick.
        Returns:
        the number of times this method has been called.

      • getPillar

        public int[] getPillar()
        returns the location that the boss' shield pillar needs to spawn
        Returns:
        the location that the boss' shield pillar needs to spawn.
